repnme.cdata!:
India - Ninth Industrial Credit and
            Investment Corporation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the Ninth Industrial
            Credit Project will be to finance the foreign exchange cost
            of ICICI sub-projects carried out by productive enterprises
            in India.
